detail_desc: Sunglasses with metal frames and tinted, UV-protective lenses.
Long-sleeved top in sweatshirt fabric with a print motif on the front and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.

Single-breasted jacket in a stretch weave with narrow notch lapels, a chest pocket, flap front pockets and an inner pocket. Decorative buttons at the cuffs and a single back vent. Lined. Skinny Fit – a slightly shorter style that shapes in at the chest and tapers sharply at the waist. This combined with narrow shoulders and sleeves creates a completely fitted silhouette.
Jumper in a fine-knit viscose blend with low dropped, frill-trimmed shoulders, long sleeves and a ribbed hem.
Leggings in sturdy cotton jersey with fake front pockets and real back pockets. Wide waist panel for best fit over the tummy.
5-pocket trousers in patterned stretch twill with a regular waist, zip fly with a button and slim legs.
Long top in soft cotton jersey with ribbing around the neckline. Straight, relaxed fit with long sleeves and a curved hem.
Shorter blouse in woven fabric with a collar, buttons down the front and ties at the hem. Dropped shoulders and long balloon sleeves with buttoned cuffs.
Sun hats in an airy cotton weave with ties under the chin. Width of brim 4 cm.
5-pocket shorts in soft, washed cotton denim with a high waist, zip fly and button and raw-edge hems.
Trunks in stretch organic cotton jersey with flatlock seams, short legs, an elasticated waist and lined front.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a print motif.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey.
Block-coloured, knee-length swim shorts in a stretch weave with an elasticated drawstring waist, fly with a hook and loop fastener and side pockets. Soft mesh inner shorts.
Boots in imitation leather with a moccasin seam and lacing at the front, loop at the back and decorative welt seam around the soles. Canvas linings and insoles and rubber soles. Heel approx. 3 cm.
Hairband with a knot detail at the front and covered elastic at the back.
Sleeveless V-neck body in soft jersey with adjustable spaghetti shoulder straps and concealed press-studs at the crotch.
Long-sleeved knitted jumper with a deep V-neck and sewn-in wrapover at the back.
Hairband with a knot detail at the front and covered elastic at the back.
Court shoes in soft imitation suede made partly from recycled polyester with pointed toes. Linings in satin made from recycled polyester and imitation leather insoles. Heel 6.5 cm.
Gilet in supersoft faux fur with a concealed fastening at the top. Lined.
Leather gloves with decorative stitching on the uppers. Soft, knitted lining.

Fleece-lined set with a hat and pair of mittens in a soft cable knit. Hat with a faux fur pompom on top, small imitation suede appliqué on the front, earflaps and ties under the chin. Mittens with ribbed cuffs. Sizes 0-2M and 2-6M without thumbs.
Short top in a soft rib knit with narrow shoulder straps.
Sleeveless dress in soft, patterned cotton jersey with a gathered seam at the waist and flared skirt.
Fitted coat in a soft, felted wool blend with notch lapels and concealed press-studs down the front. Detachable tie belt at the waist, pockets in the side seams and a single back vent. Lined.
Joggers in sturdy sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, zipped side pockets and tapered legs with ribbed sections at the knees and ribbed hems.
Boxer briefs with an elasticated waist and lined gusset.
Soft, non-wired jersey bra with narrow adjustable shoulder straps, an elasticated hem and no fasteners. Lined.

ANNA GLOVER x H&M. Oversized dress in a crêpe weave with a small stand-up collar, buttons down the front and detachable tie belt at the waist. Dropped shoulders and long, wide sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Longer at the back. Unlined.
Ankle-length trousers in woven fabric with elastication at the back of the waist and pleats at the front. Zip fly and button, a low crotch and wide, gently tapered legs.

Short-sleeved shirt and pair of shorts in a cotton and linen weave. Shirt with a grandad collar, buttons down the front and flap chest pockets with a button. Shorts with adjustable elastication and buttons at the waist, and side pockets.
Fully lined bikini with a triangle top and briefs. Top with sequin-embroidered appliqués, narrow adjustable shoulder straps and a plastic fastener at the back.
Hard plastic smartphone case with a selfie light in two places. Built-in battery. USB 2.0 charging cable included. Fits iPhone 6/7. The cable is only for charging and synchronisation via a computer.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a print motif on the front.
Bucket bag in grained imitation leather with two handles and a drawstring at the top. Size 14x28x29 cm.
Gently fitted jacket in a linen and viscose weave with no lapels, a concealed hook-and-eye fastening at the front, welt front pockets and 3/4-length, gathered sleeves. Lined.
Jacquard-knit jumper in soft cotton with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

KAROLINA KIJAK x H&M. Batik-patterned top in soft sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with a print motif on the front. Jersey-lined, wrapover hood, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Calf-length, pleated skirt in an airy weave. High waist with covered elastication and a gently flared hem with an overlocked edge. Lined.
Knee-length skirt with decorative buttons down the front and a concealed zip at the back.
Knee-length dress in airy mesh with beaded appliqués, short sleeves with a frill trim and a seam with a double frill trim at the hem. Jersey underdress.
Long-sleeved tops in soft cotton jersey with a press-stud on one shoulder (except in sizes 1½-4Y) and ribbing around the neckline.
Jersey-lined trousers in narrow-wale cotton corduroy. Elasticated waist with a twisted drawstring and one back pocket.

Dress in a soft cotton weave with stripes in glittery thread. Frills at the front that continue over the shoulders, buttons at the back and a flared skirt with a tulle underskirt. Woven cotton lining.
Pyjamas in soft cotton jersey. Long-sleeved tops with ribbed cuffs. Bottoms with an elasticated waist and ribbed hems.
Short, fitted dress in crinkled velour with a stand-up collar and concealed zip at the back. Long puff sleeves with reinforced organza shoulder sections and a pleat at the cuffs for added width.
Jacket in coated cotton twill with a detachable, pile-lined hood and stand-up collar. Zip down the front with a chin guard, side pockets, and inner ribbing at the cuffs. Pile lining.
Long-sleeved dress in jersey made from a cotton blend with a zip at the back, side pockets and a seam at the waist with pleats.
Hair elastics in various colours and designs with metal clips. Two with decorations.
Soft, non-wired lace bra with removable inserts that give the bust a natural shape and light support. Adjustable double shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.

Shirt in an airy weave made from a cotton blend with a turn-down collar and French front. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, a yoke at the back and a rounded hem. Slim fit with narrow shoulders and a tapered waist for a fitted silhouette.
Satin top with a V-neck, lace at the top, narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and slits in the sides.

Microfibre push-up bras with lace details and underwired, moulded, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Adjustable shoulder straps and a fastening at the back with two pairs of hooks and eyes.
Slipover in a soft cotton knit with a V-neck and ribbed hem.
Joggers in an airy viscose weave with an elasticated waist with a tasselled drawstring, side pockets and tapered legs with covered elastic at the hems.
Fine-knit knee socks in a soft cotton blend with a high shaft that ends at the knee.
Trousers in washed stretch cotton twill with an adjustable elasticated waist, fake fly with a press-stud and front and back pockets.
Slip-on fabric trainers with elastic gores at the front, a padded top edge and a loop at the back. Fabric linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Trainer sandals in cotton canvas with a hook and loop tab at the front and small loop at the back. Cotton canvas linings and insoles and patterned soles.

T-shirt in hard-washed slub cotton jersey with a slightly wider, raw-edge neckline and seam centre back. Short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups, and a rounded hem with slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Short-sleeved top in soft jersey made from a cotton and modal blend.
Stylish, fitted top in soft cotton jersey with short sleeves and ribbing around the neckline.
Semi shiny nylon stockings with a wide, reinforced trim at the top. Use with a suspender belt. 20 denier.
Baby Exclusive. Shorts in ribbed organic cotton jersey with an elasticated waist, fake fly with decorative buttons and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Padded ski mittens in windproof, water-repellent functional fabric with reinforced palms, elastication at the wrists and a faux fur trim. Thinsulate™ lining.
Skirt in pleated chiffon with covered elastication at the waist, an overlocked hem and jersey lining.
Set with a dress and leggings in soft organic cotton jersey. Dress with cap sleeves and an elasticated seam at the waist with a decorative bow. Leggings with an elasticated waist.
Cigarette trousers in a slightly stretchy weave with a fake fly, side pockets, fake welt back pockets and slim, gently tapered legs with creases. Wide jersey ribbing at the waist for best fit.
Push-up tights that lift and shape with an elasticated waist. 30 denier.

Jacket in a linen and viscose weave with a shawl collar and 3/4-length sleeves with gathers at the cuffs. Concealed pockets in the side seams and a detachable tie belt at the waist. No fasteners. Lined.
T-shirt in printed cotton jersey.

Open-sided ankle boots in imitation leather with elastic gores in the sides and adjustable straps with a metal fastener and studs. Fabric linings and insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles. Heel approx. 3.5 cm.
T-shirt in printed cotton jersey. Short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups and a double layer at the hem with short slits in the sides.

V-neck playsuit in softly draping Tencel™ lyocell denim with buttons down the front and short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups. Covered elastication and a tie belt at the waist, side pockets and short, wide legs.
Short, fitted skirt in jersey. High waist with concealed elastication, and a slit at the front of the hem. Unlined.
Long-sleeved bodysuits in soft, organic cotton jersey with a wrapover front and press-studs at the side and crotch.
Sleeveless, V-neck blouse in woven fabric with scalloped trims around the armholes and front of the neckline. Lined.
Engraved metal rings in various designs.

Pyjamas with an oversized top in sweatshirt fabric and pair of leggings in jersey. Top with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside. Leggings with an elasticated waist.
